attributes.action: change the london 2012 Asbo hoodie chav tag inspired logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London 2012 olympic'logo'(tag)seems to represent the asbo hoddie chav tagging culture that blights every scratched bus window/bus shelter in the capital.
1)Have a competion/redesign to come up with a design for the 2012 logo that will really represent london well. 

**CHANGE THIS AWFUL 2012 LOGO**

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
